author: @molenz1960
text: I've modified the code to be compatible with PyQt5 for anyone having issues like I was   import sys from PyQt5 import QtWidgets from PyQt5.QtGui import QIcon   class Window(QtWidgets.QMainWindow):      def __init__(self):         super(Window, self).__init__()         self.setGeometry(50, 50, 500, 300)         self.setWindowTitle('Windows Title')         self.setWindowIcon(QIcon('Python_icon.ico'))         self.show()   app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv) gui = Window() sys.exit(app.exec_())
